name: Escape from the Wash Basin
description:
Cerberus doesn't want to take his bath today! Help him reach the fields of Elysium to frolic in the grass.

Cerberus is of course an amalgamation of three dogs named Jack, Kahuna, and Laguna. Cerberus is strong and mighty, but a little oafish. When Cerberus separates into its brothers and sisters, they are free to practice their special talents. Each dog will play a special role in their ESCAPE FROM THE WASHBASIN!

Controls

[SPACE]: Join Together/Split Apart

[WASD]: Move

[J]: Command Jack to stay

[K]: Command Kahuna to stay

[L]: Command Laguna to stay

[I]: Command all dogs to perform their special talent

Cerberus, and Its Brothers and Sisters

Kahuna - Fires balls of fire to defeat armies of goats.

Laguna - Unearths digging enemies so that they are vulnerable to Kahuna's fire balls.

Jack - Jack's special power hasn't "bloomed" yet, so he'll need to hide behind his sisters

Install Instructions

Download the .zip file, extract it, and run the .exe
